title: Jordan Superpowers, Oprah Is a Forgiving God 4.6.20
itunes:title: Jordan Superpowers, Oprah Is a Forgiving God 4.6.20
description:
In episode 602, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by Worst Year Ever's Katy Stoll to discuss Oprah letting Stedman back into the house, Jane Fonda on TikTok, Jared Kushner continuing to be a useless idiot, super humans like Michael Jordan, quarantine activities, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Oprah Let Stedman Come Back to the Mansion
  2. Jane Fonda, 82, resurrects her iconic workout videos on TikTok
  3. WATCH: Jane Fonda's Workout for Beginners, 1982
  4. Trump makes sure to take a question from OAN staffer Chanel Rion even though she was banished from the White House Correspondents' Association for attending briefings she wasn't supposed to be at
  5. Jared Kushner Ripped For Saying ‘Our Stockpile’ Isn’t Meant For States To Use
  6. Behind the scenes, Kushner takes charge of coronavirus response
  7. JARED KUSHNER: "The notion of the federal stockpile was it's supposed to be our stockpile. It's not supposed to be states stockpiles that they then use."
  8. Carrier Roosevelt CO Relieved Over ‘Extremely Poor Judgment’ in Creating ‘Firestorm’ Over COVID-19 Outbreak
  9. WATCH: Studio Rio - Bill Withers - Lovely Day

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
